channel.title: English on A Life of Inquiry
channel.description: Recent content in English on A Life of Inquiry

item.title: Running Rancher Desktop on MXLinux
item.description:
On January 26th, Rancher Desktop was officially released as v1.0.0.

In this article, I’ll try to install and run Rancher Desktop on MXLinux.

item.title: Karpenter Deep Dive
item.description:
Recently, Karpenter graduated from AWS re:Invent with autoscaling of Nodes in Kubernetes clusters.

In this article, we’ll take a deeper look at it.
